title: Let's Ride Away
lyrics:
Let's ride away
Let's ride away

Let's ride away

Hold on tight to what we have
When it's this good, you don't look back
Tiny dots on the horizon
Yeah, you and me, quicker than lightning
Over canyons and over plains
Let's saddle up and ride away

Let's ride away
Let's ride away
Mm, let's ride away

Let's ride away
Let's ride away
Mm, let's ride away
Let's ride away
